amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for the Debt Indicator program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1946 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1946 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S13119-13120, S13122; text: CR S13119) To prohibit the use of funds for the Debt Indicator program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1946 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Akaka.
